how.title: My involvement
how.content: I was responsible for all front end development - We produced many wireframes, POCs and bespoke functionality.
how.thoughts:
One of my favourite parts of this build was the microsite for 'Monster Practice'. I integrated some smooth scrolling and gallery features into the CMS.
Img here
The ecommerce checkout is also very bespoke, I really enjoyed building the various checkout flows and features.
Img here
